label: Quark mixing probabilities sum to 1
reason: Requires Wolfram Alpha API, experimental data, or advanced computation not yet implemented
note: PENDING: Quark mixing probabilities sum to 1. Validation: No quark vanishes, only rotates
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
visible = reg.visible_sector     # 125
sterile = reg.sterile_sector     # 163
roots = reg.roots_total          # 288

# CKM unitarity: probability conservation in quark mixing
# V^dag V = I means no probability leaks to sterile sector
unitarity_sum = (visible + sterile) / roots  # Must equal 1
verified = abs(unitarity_sum - 1.0) < 1e-10
